name: The Grid (itch) (Pookes)
description:
~The Grid~

The Grid is a multiplayer turn-based strategy game, inspired by the Battle Network combat mechanism. 

Pick the best available spell, use your spells in the correct order and place, position yourself in a safe place and pray you'll become

The Grid Alpha!

Enjoy playing online against your friends, or chill with the single-player arena that will challenge your skills.

The game is still in active development. Any comment will be much appreciated!
